scripts.deploy-ic: DFX_NETWORK=ic npm run extract-id  && nuxt generate && dfx deploy --ic
scripts.deploy-ic-frontend: DFX_NETWORK=ic npm run extract-id  && nuxt generate && dfx deploy frontend --ic
scripts.deploy-playground: DFX_NETWORK=playground npm run extract-id && nuxt generate && dfx deploy --playground
scripts.deploy-local: DFX_NETWORK=local npm run extract-id && nuxt generate && dfx deploy
scripts.dev: DFX_NETWORK=local npm run extract-id  && nuxt dev
